name: ISA Surf Level 1 Instructor Certification
description: The Level 1 course is the foundation for those teaching beginner and early intermediate surfers. This internationally recognized program equips instructors with essential skills, safety knowledge, and teaching techniques to deliver high-quality, engaging surf lessons.

name: Bla bla
description: The Level 1 course is the foundation for those teaching beginner and early intermediate surfers. This internationally recognized program equips instructors with essential skills, safety knowledge, and teaching techniques to deliver high-quality, engaging surf lessons.

name: ISA Surf Level 2 Instructor Certification
description: For experienced instructors, the Level 2 course focuses on training intermediate to advanced surfers. It prepares coaches to enhance athletes skills, optimize performance, and prepare them for competitions.

name: ISA Judging Certification
description: For those interested in surf competition officiating, the ISA Judging Course provides comprehensive training on scoring criteria, heat analysis, and judging protocols. Delivered by experienced ISA presenters, the course includes practice sessions for comparing waves and assigning scores.

name: ISA/ILS Water Safety Certification
description: A vital component of surf coaching, this course ensures instructors are equipped with globally recognized water safety skills.

name: ISA Surf Level 3 Instructor Certification
description: For experienced instructors, the Level 3 course focuses on training advanced surfers. It prepares coaches to enhance athletes skills, optimize performance, and prepare them for competitions.

name: ISA Surf Level 4 Instructor Certification
description: For experienced instructors, the Level 4 course focuses on training elite surfers. It prepares coaches to enhance athletes skills, optimize performance, and prepare them for competitions.

name: ISA Surf Level 5 Instructor Certification
description: For experienced instructors, the Level 5 course focuses on training international surfers. It prepares coaches to enhance athletes skills, optimize performance, and prepare them for competitions.

name: ISA Surf Level 6 Instructor Certification
description: For experienced instructors, the Level 6 course focuses on training professional surfers. It prepares coaches to enhance athletes skills, optimize performance, and prepare them for competitions.
